delete_account.title: ⚠️ Attention!
delete_account.intro: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
delete_account.b1: Your account will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.
delete_account.b2: All ride data and trip history will be removed.
delete_account.b3: All transaction records, balances and accounts will be deleted.
delete_account.b5: All accumulated bonuses and discounts will be voided.
delete_account.b6: Your driver rating will be lost.
